name: @hubspot/local-dev-lib
description: Provides library functionality for HubSpot local development tooling, including the HubSpot CLI

scripts.check-main: branch=$(git rev-parse --abbrev-ref HEAD) && [ $branch = main ] || (echo 'Error: New release can only be published on main branch' && exit 1)
scripts.local-dev: yarn build && cd dist && yarn link && cd .. && tsc --watch --rootDir . --outdir dist
scripts.pub: cd dist && npm publish --tag latest && cd ..
scripts.release:major: yarn check-main && yarn version --major && yarn build && yarn pub && yarn push
scripts.release:minor: yarn check-main && yarn version --minor && yarn build && yarn pub && yarn push
scripts.release:patch: yarn check-main && yarn version --patch && yarn build && yarn pub && yarn push
